# stateChangedNotification

**Type Property**

A notification the document object posts when there’s a change in the state of the document.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated class let stateChangedNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

When handling this notification, check the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/documentState] property to see what the new state is, and then proceed accordingly. There’s no `userInfo` dictionary.
title: stateChangedNotification
